short_summary: Enterprise Customer Identity and Access Management Software as a Service for the Government of Canada
full_summary:
=====================================

**Tender Announcement: Enterprise Customer Identity and Access Management (CIAM) Software as a Service**

**Reference Number:** SSC-23-00023000:T

**Amendment Number:** 4

**Publication Date:** June 19, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** July 7, 2023, 10:00:00 a.m. (ET)

**Amendment Date:** July 7, 2023

**Expected Contract Start Date:** Not applicable

**Expected Contract End Date:** Not applicable

**Procurement Category:** SRVTGD

**Notice Type:** Request for Information (RFI)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive Open Bidding

**Selection Criteria:** Not applicable

**Trade Agreements:** Not applicable

The Government of Canada, represented by Shared Services Canada (SSC), seeks to acquire an Enterprise Customer Identity and Access Management (CIAM) Software as a Service solution. This solution will enable the Government of Canada to securely manage the identities and access of its customers.

**Eligibility and Registration:**

To be eligible to participate in this procurement, interested bidders must register on the SSC Procurement Portal (P2P) at [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login). To register, please click on the "Register Now" button.

*   Solicitation Number: BPM019000/23000
